faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our Biblical Wisdom Guide platform

general.title: General Questions
general.a1: Biblical Wisdom Guide is a comprehensive platform dedicated to making biblical wisdom accessible to everyone. We offer daily Bible verses, interactive Bible stories, and the unique Book of Answers feature. Our platform combines traditional biblical teachings with modern technology to help users deepen their understanding of the Bible and apply its wisdom to their daily lives.
general.q2: How can I benefit from using this platform?
general.a2: Our platform offers multiple ways to engage with biblical wisdom. You can start your day with a meaningful Bible verse, explore interactive Bible stories that bring ancient wisdom to life, and use the Book of Answers for personal guidance. Whether you're new to the Bible or a long-time student, our resources are designed to support your spiritual journey and help you find practical wisdom for modern life.

bookOfAnswers.title: Book of Answers
bookOfAnswers.q1: What is the Book of Answers?
bookOfAnswers.a1: The Book of Answers is a unique feature that combines biblical wisdom with interactive guidance. When you have a question or face a challenge, the Book of Answers provides relevant biblical verses and insights to help you find direction. This feature draws from the rich tradition of biblical wisdom literature, offering practical guidance rooted in timeless spiritual principles.
bookOfAnswers.q2: How does the Book of Answers work?
bookOfAnswers.a2: The Book of Answers uses a carefully curated collection of biblical verses and wisdom teachings to provide guidance. When you ask a question, the system selects relevant passages that address your specific situation. These selections are based on traditional biblical interpretation methods and are designed to offer meaningful insights while respecting the sacred nature of biblical wisdom.
bookOfAnswers.q3: Can I trust the guidance from the Book of Answers?
bookOfAnswers.a3: The Book of Answers is designed to provide guidance based on biblical wisdom and principles. While it offers valuable insights, it's important to remember that it's a tool for reflection and guidance, not a replacement for personal prayer or spiritual counsel. We encourage users to use it as part of their broader spiritual practice and personal discernment.

dailyVerses.title: Daily Bible Verses
dailyVerses.q1: How are the daily verses selected?
dailyVerses.a1: Our daily verses are carefully selected to provide a balanced representation of biblical wisdom. We consider various factors including the liturgical calendar, seasonal themes, and contemporary relevance. Each verse is chosen to offer meaningful insights and practical wisdom for daily life, drawing from the rich tradition of biblical teaching and interpretation.
dailyVerses.q2: Can I access previous daily verses?
dailyVerses.a2: Yes, you can access our archive of daily verses. This feature allows you to revisit meaningful passages and continue your reflection on specific themes or teachings. The archive is organized chronologically and by theme, making it easy to find verses that resonate with your current spiritual journey or personal needs.

technical.title: Technical Questions
technical.q1: Is the platform available in multiple languages?
technical.a1: Yes, our platform supports multiple languages to make biblical wisdom accessible to a global audience. We offer translations of both the interface and the biblical content, ensuring that users can engage with the material in their preferred language. Our translations are carefully reviewed to maintain the accuracy and nuance of the original biblical texts.
technical.q2: How can I report technical issues?
technical.a2: If you encounter any technical issues, you can report them through our contact form or email support. We strive to address all technical concerns promptly to ensure a smooth experience for all users. Your feedback helps us improve the platform and better serve our community of users seeking biblical wisdom.
